titleStmt.title: An exact and sound discovery of the chiefe mysteries of jesuiticall iniquity
titleStmt.author: Bargrave, Isaac, 1586-1643.
Micanzio, Fulgenzio, attrib. auth.

notesStmt.note: "A translation of 'Instruttione a ̀prencipi .. si governano li padri giesuiti', Poschiavo, 1617, now attrib. to Fulgenzio Micanzio. Probably suppressed by order of Buckingham."--STC.
Reproduction of the original in the Emmanuel College (University of Cambridge) Library.
